meanings.definition: The practice or profession of making and fitting dentures.
meanings.sent1: Denturism requires skill and precision to create comfortable dentures.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in denturism to help people with missing teeth.
meanings.sent3: The dentist joked that his denturism skills were so good, he could make dentures in his sleep!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to denturism was like an artist sculpting masterpieces for smiles.
meanings.sent5: The workshop was filled with the sounds of denturism in action, creating new smiles every day.

meanings.definition: The study or science of denture construction and fitting.
meanings.sent1: In denturism classes, students learn the intricate details of denture construction.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in denturism are constantly seeking ways to improve denture materials.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for denturism was contagious, making even the most complex topics interesting.
meanings.sent4: The precision required in denturism is akin to solving a challenging puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on denturism was filled with colorful diagrams illustrating the process of denture fitting.
